duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform an extensive range of administrative tasks such as calendar management, expenses, coordination of complex international and domestic travel itineraries, etc.
Work closely with our CEO and Presidents
Coordinate, arrange, and run logistics for staff meetings and a variety of other meetings, including preparing meeting materials ahead of time
Document meeting minutes as well as manage and track action items
Heavy calendar, managing logistics for meetings, conference room assignments and room maintenance, complex itineraries and travel, etc.
Research and compile briefing documents in preparation for meetings and interviews

education_certification.credential: BA / BS degree or equivalent work experience
Bachelor's degree or Associate's degree preferred
